name: Breaded and Fried Scallops
author: amberrlp
summary: I love scallops, and I wanted to try them fried but had limited ingredients. This was super easy and delicious. I started to make it all the time.
ingredients: 1 cup Italian-season bread crumbs, or more to taste
salt and ground black pepper to taste
½ cup bay scallops, or more to taste
directions: Mix bread crumbs, salt, and pepper in a resealable plastic bag
Whisk egg lightly in a bowl
Dip scallops in egg; place in the bread crumb mixture in the bag
Seal bag and shake until scallops are coated with bread crumbs
Bring butter, olive oil, and lemon juice to a simmer in a skillet over medium-high heat
Add breaded scallops; cook, shaking skillet occasionally, until browned, 6 to 7 minutes
